name: User Management App
description: A private Firebase/React app made to manage client access to the dashboards for the company I was working with at the time; architected and developed from the ground up by me.

name: Weather App
description: One of the first applications I made as a way to test my skills at the time of development.

name: mCompass Addon | Garry's Mod
description: A horizontal & customizable compass addon I made for a popular video game - "Garry's Mod" with almost 80,000 current subscribers, rated 5 out of 5 stars with over 1000 reviews. Source code features some pretty advanced maths for the time of writing (I was 17 years old).

name: Tow Launcher Addon | Garry's Mod
description: A US BGM-71 TOW missile launcher addon I made for a popular video game - "Garry's Mod" with almost 17,000 current subscribers, rated 5 out of 5 stars with over 700 reviews. Source code features some pretty advanced vector maths for the time of writing (I was 16 years old).
